name: StrategyBotsMobile
description:
StrategyBots is a little mobile project i made during my studies in Game Dev at Veron University.

The game is a 1vs1 competitive strategy game where 2 people can play on the same device to decide who is the best killer robot strategist.

Credits:

Davide "Wylter" Di Bernardo (Programmer, Game Designer)

Giovanni Carnovale (Composer,  Graphic Designer)

Source Code:

https://github.com/wylter/StrategyBots
